entry.string: From: Amol Sarva <a@sarva.co> Date: 2013-07-09 14:42:00 To: shelby@getnomi.com, shelby@getnomi.com, david@knotable.co Cc: Subject: 33 5th floor David We are going to make a push to make habitable for 10 people by Monday Shelby will tour with a lady's eye on Thursd with you. Please coordinate. Lets get our taskrabbits fired up (or your friends). Just buy two power drills and some beers for Friday. We can pay them... Desks whiteboard shelves We have to get those chairs ordered asap. Amol Sarva Ph.D. // @amol // a.sarva.co // 530-727-8277

From: David Leon Rosenthal <rosenthal.dleon@gmail.com> Date: 2013-07-09 15:20:00 To: a@sarva.c Cc: shelby@getnomi.com, shelby@getnomi.co Subject: Re: 33 5th floor Thanks Amol--I can hire two people for $154 with their own tools. Buy 10 chairs or 21? -David [Quoted text hidden]

From: David Leon Rosenthal <rosenthal.dleon@gmail.com> Date: 2013-07-09 15:21:00 To: a@sarva.c Cc: shelby@getnomi.com, shelby@getnomi.co Subject: Re: 33 5th floor Shelby--can you meet Thursday afternoon, perhaps 1pm? -David On Tue, Jul 9, 2013 at 2:42 PM, Amol Sarva <a@sarva.co> wrote: [Quoted text hidden]

From: Shelby Schulz <shelby@getnomi.com> Date: 2013-07-09 15:26:00 To: rosenthal.dleon@gmail.co Cc: a@sarva.c Subject: Re: 33 5th floor Hi David, 1pm is great. See you there. If you want some furniture recommendations, I have a few. I also know a company that does furniture rentals if you're interested. Let me know, Shelby [Quoted text hidden] -- Shelby Schulz getnomi.com 409-692-0005
From: Amol Sarva <a@sarva.co> Date: 2013-07-09 16:19:00 To: rosenthal.dleon@gmail.co Cc: Subject: Re: 33 5th floor Hire away Just ordered 8 chairs [Quoted text hidden] --

From: Amol Sarva <a@sarva.co> Date: 2013-07-09 19:30:00 To: shelby@getnomi.co Cc: rosenthal.dleon@gmail.co Subject: Re: 33 5th floor Shelby Discussed the details with norman today and planned all the furniture etc. thinking Tuesday highly likely and monday possible. Depends on if they finish varnishing. Amol Sarva Ph.D. // @amol // a.sarva.co // 530-727-8277 [Quoted text hidden]
From: David Leon Rosenthal <rosenthal.dleon@gmail.com> Date: 2013-07-11 12:25:00 To: a@sarva.c Cc: shelby@getnomi.co Subject: Re: 33 5th floor Shelby--see you in 35. -David [Quoted text hidden]

From: David Leon Rosenthal <rosenthal.dleon@gmail.com> Date: 2013-07-11 12:30:00 To: a@sarva.c Cc: shelby@getnomi.co Subject: Re: 33 5th floor Come to the 4th floor, Proclivity office. Best, David [Quoted text hidden]
From: Shelby Schulz <shelby@getnomi.com> Date: 2013-07-11 12:30:00 To: rosenthal.dleon@gmail.co Cc: a@sarva.c Subject: Re: 33 5th floor Sounds good David. See you soon. [Quoted text hidden]

From: Shelby Schulz <shelby@getnomi.com> Date: 2013-07-11 12:58:00 To: rosenthal.dleon@gmail.co Cc: a@sarva.c Subject: Re: 33 5th floor Hi David, running a few behind. Have to do a last minute flight booking Sent from my iPhone, please excuse any typos. [Quoted text hidden]
From: David Leon Rosenthal <rosenthal.dleon@gmail.com> Date: 2013-07-11 13:01:00 To: shelby@getnomi.co Cc: Subject: Re: 33 5th floor No problem [Quoted text hidden]

From: Amol Sarva <a@sarva.co> Date: 2013-07-14 20:55:00 To: shelby@getnomi.co Cc: rosenthal.dleon@gmail.co Subject: Re: 33 5th floor Shelby We are buying some furniture etc and we will share it with you but you are renting space, not a furnished office like at MicroOffice. Make sure you guys are prepared to get your own stuff if you don't like what we provide. Our general plan of attack is have a bunch of "ok" tables and chairs. Then we will spend August getting it up to super stylish beautifulness. Amol Sarva, Ph.D. // @amol // 530-727-8277 // a.sarva.co [Quoted text hidden]

From: Shelby Schulz <shelby@getnomi.com> Date: 2013-07-14 21:23:00 To: a@sarva.c Cc: rosenthal.dleon@gmail.co Subject: Re: 33 5th floor Thanks Amol. I'm going to come by tomorrow for another look at the space to determine if we can send our engineering team over. Let me know how else I can help. Cheers, Shelby [Quoted text hidden]

From: Amol Sarva <a@sarva.co> Date: 2013-07-14 21:30:00 To: shelby@getnomi.co Cc: rosenthal.dleon@gmail.co Subject: Re: 33 5th floor They are sealing the floor (they stained it Saturday) so during the day is no good. 5pm... [Quoted text hidden] --

From: Shelby Schulz <shelby@getnomi.com> Date: 2013-07-14 21:34:00 To: a@sarva.c Cc: rosenthal.dleon@gmail.co Subject: Re: 33 5th floor Ah. No problem. What I really want to see is the space once the desks are in so that I can see the spatial relations. Maybe it's better if I come on Tuesday instead? [Quoted text hidden]

From: Amol Sarva <a@sarva.co> Date: 2013-07-14 21:45:00 To: shelby@getnomi.co Cc: rosenthal.dleon@gmail.co Subject: Re: 33 5th floor The desks are built so after hours Monday could work but Tuesday is better. Just have a few guys show up and if they want to retreat to Micro Office they can [Quoted text hidden]
From: Shelby Schulz <shelby@getnomi.com> Date: 2013-07-14 21:46:00 To: a@sarva.c Cc: rosenthal.dleon@gmail.co Subject: Re: 33 5th floor Perfect. Tuesday it is. [Quoted text hidden]

From: David Leon Rosenthal <rosenthal.dleon@gmail.com> Date: 2013-07-14 22:49:00 To: shelby@getnomi.co Cc: a@sarva.c Subject: Re: 33 5th floor Sorry for the mixup. See you tuesday. -David [Quoted text hidden]
